Extract Team Stats for a year and sport.

team_stats.Rd

Option to select data per season or per game

team_stats(team_id, year, sport, by = "season")

Arguments

team_id

Team ID (form team_mapping)
year

Select year, (example: 2015-2016 season is 2016)
sport

Tradiational Sport Name
by

Stats over season, or stats per game

Examples

team_stats(697,2016,"MBB",by="SEASON")
#>             Player Ht      MP FGM   FGA   FG% 3FG 3FGA  3FG%  FT FTA   FT%
#> 17          Totals  - 7500:00 991 2,208 44.88 281  823 34.14 565 841 67.18
#> 18 Opponent Totals  - 7500:00 862 2,118 40.70 283  849 33.33 451 685 65.84
#>      PTS   Avg ORebs DRebs Tot Reb Avg.1 AST  TO STL BLK Fouls Dbl Dbl Trpl Dbl
#> 17 2,828 76.43   477   983   1,460 39.46 613 447 260 133   669      NA       NA
#> 18 2,458 66.43   405   891   1,296 35.03 493 534 199 131   725      NA       NA
#>    DQ year
#> 17  8 2016
#> 18 22 2016

team_stats(697,2016,"WSO",by="game")
